member.name: IUIAnimationManagerEventHandler2.OnManagerStatusChanged
member.param: The new status of the animation manager.
The previous status of the animation manager.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManagerEventHandler2
member.summary: Defines a method for handling updates to an .
